title: Handle a Promoter Inquiry
description: A concert promoter is inquiring about booking their artist for a show at the venue next year.

tasks.description: Gather information about the artist, their genre, and their typical attendance figures.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the basic details of the potential event.

tasks.description: Check the venue's booking calendar for availability in the requested time frame.
Provide the promoter with the venue's standard rental rates and technical specifications packet.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends the relevant information packet.

tasks.description: Offer to place a temporary, no-obligation hold on a date for them.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent places a hold to encourage the promoter to move forward.
